entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
"If you're struggling with COVID-19, and you've got a problem with your eyesight, what is the government advice?" 

Cabinet Minister @michaelgove is pressed on what the official guidance is around the impact of coronavirus on eyesight. JJ

#KayBurley https://t.co/n3UcpI5CJj
